description: A Markdown, ReStructured Text, HTML, Jade, Pug, Image, CSS, Mermaid previewer.
config.markdown.abbr.enabled: Enable/disable rendering Abbreviation (<abbr>) tag in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.anchor.enabled: Enable/disable adding an id attribute (#id) to headings in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.attrs.enabled: Enable/disable adding classes (.class), identifiers (#id) and attributes (name="value") in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.attrs.allowedAttributes: allowed attributes, empty array as all attributes are allowed, Now only id, class and attributes beginning with regex are allowed, such as /^regex.*$/.
config.markdown.bracketed-spans.enabled: Enable/disable rendering Span (<span>) tag  in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.cjk-breaks.enabled: Enable/disable suppressing linebreaks between east asian characters in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.deflist.enabled: Enable/disable rendering Definition list (<dl>) tag in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.emoji.enabled: Enable/disable rendering emoji & emoticon & emoticons shortcuts in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.expand-tabs.enabled: Enable/disable replaceing leading tabs with spaces in fenced code blocks in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.expand-tabs.tabWidth: Specify the number of spaces per indentation-level to be replaced.
config.markdown.footnote.enabled: Enable/disable rendering footnode in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.highlightjs.enabled: Enable/disable highlight code blocks in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.highlightjs.auto: Whether to automatically detect language if not specified.
config.markdown.highlightjs.code: Whether to add the hljs class to raw code blocks (not fenced code blocks).
config.markdown.highlightjs.ignoreIllega: Forces highlighting to finish even in case of detecting illegal syntax for the language instead of throwing an exception.
config.markdown.html.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.ins.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.lazy-headers.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.mark.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.markdown.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.mermaid.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.pug.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.rst.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.sub.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.sup.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.task-lists.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
